definitions.definition: A chief person; a head man
An executioner whose method of dispatching the condemned is decapitation .
A labourer in a colliery who transports the coal from the workings to the horseway, and who is oftentimes assisted by a younger worker called a foal .
One in command of a whaling vessel.

main_definition: ( obsolete or Scotland ) A chief person; a head man
secondary_definitions: An executioner whose method of dispatching the condemned is decapitation .
( mining , historical ) A labourer in a colliery who transports the coal from the workings to the horseway, and who is oftentimes assisted by a younger worker called a foal .
( nautical ) One in command of a whaling vessel.
